affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
cmb:
110/120/130/140
11
lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.
name: sandking_burrowstrike

affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Channeled
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.
notes: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
cmb:
60/50/40/30
40/30/20/10
lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
name: sandking_sand_storm

desc:
Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies.
Caustic Finale is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
notes:
Units afflicted with the debuff will explode even if Sand King did not deliver the killing blow.
The buff is not placed on allied units.
attrib:
EXPLODE RADIUS: 400
EXPLODE DEATH DAMAGE: 90/130/170/220
EXPLODE TIMER DAMAGE: 27/39/51/66
EXPLODE TIMER: 6
MOVE SLOW: 20%
SLOW DURATION: 3
lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.
name: sandking_caustic_finale

affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Channeled
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.
The pulses have gradually inreasing radius: 275/325/375/425/475/525/575/650/675/700 ( 775/825 *).
attrib:
PULSES: 6/8/10
DAMAGE PER PULSE: 110/110/110
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%/30%/30%
ATTACK SLOW: 30
SLOW DURATION: 3
SCEPTER PULSES: 8/10/12
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 120/100/80
cmb:
175/250/325
140/120/100
lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
name: sandking_epicenter
